roleset.name: distinct, separate, unalike

role.descr: domain in which args 1 and 2 are different

example.name: args 1, 3 and CAU
example.text: Why-1 are "put" and "but" different in their pronunciation [*-1] ?

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WSJ data. Corresponds to differ-v.01 (battle-36.4-1), differentiation-n.01 (separate-23.1).
